onCommand

public boolean onCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                         org.bukkit.command.Command command,
                         String commandLabel,
                         String[] args)
The main command handler. Bukkit calls this to pass commands into the plugin.

Specified by:
onCommand in interface org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor
Parameters:
sender - The sender, Usually a player. It could be the console, but that is not supported by this plugin.
command - The command to execute
commandLabel - The command Alias used to execute this command
args - All the args past to the command
Returns:
Parse Success
